alias.instructions: Confirmation request will be sent to email address above. Please check it for further instructions.

notify.title: Notification Details
notify.to_all: Notify everyone with access to this folder
notify.comment: Comment (optional), which will be sent to users you wanted to notify of changes

search_hints.folder: Search for items from specified folder
search_hints.subject: Search for words in the subject line (subject:Dinner)
search_hints.hasattachment: Search for messages with an attachment
search_hints.isflagged: Search for messages that are flagged
search_hints.isunread: Search for messages that are unread
search_hints.isread: Search for messages that are read
search_hints.isdone: Search for tasks that are done
search_hints.cc: Used to specify recipients in the Cc: field
search_hints.bcc: Used to specify recipients in the Bcc: field
search_hints.sms: Used to specify recipients in the SMS: field
search_hints.after: Search for messages sent after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.creationdate: Search for items created at given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.aftertime: Search for messages sent after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_e: Search for items starting after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_f: Search for items modified after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_t: Search for items ending after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_j: Search for items starting after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before: Search for messages sent before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.beforetime: Search for messages sent before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_e: Search for items starting before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_f: Search for items modified before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_t: Search for items ending before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_j: Search for items starting before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.title: Used to specify item title (title:Test)
search_hints.description: Used to specify description or note (description:Test)
search_hints.name: Used to specify contact name
search_hints.keyword: Search for items with specified tag (tag:Business)
search_hints.tag: Search for items with specified tag (tag:Business)
search_hints.tag2: Search for items with tag "%s" (used in %s items)
search_hints.greater: Search depending on size in kB (greater:1024)
search_hints.smaller: Search depending on size in kB (smaller:1024)
search_hints.note: Search for a contact with some note (note:VIP)
search_hints.isprivate: Search for tasks that are private
search_hints.ispublic: Search for tasks that are public
search_hints.isfree: Search for tasks that are free
search_hints.isbusy: Search for tasks that are busy

notifier.permissions:
Desktop notifications let you know when you have a new email or chat message, even if your browser is not visible.
First choose how you want to be notified. Click OK and confirm the next dialog window to enable desktop notifications.
notifier.denied: You have denied access to desktop notifications.
notifier.new_revision: New document revision has been created.
notifier.email_added: Email address has been added to contact.
notifier.contact_email_list_full: Failed to add email address, all fields are taken.

map.g_geo_missing_address: Missing Address: The address was either missing or had no value.
map.g_geo_too_many_queries: Too Many Queries: The daily geocoding quota for this site has been exceeded.
map.g_geo_server_error: Server Error: The geocoding request could not be processed.

home.licenses_text:
Get the most out of your IceWarp account. Click here for additional software downloads, activation keys, guides and syntax you need to access your calendars, contacts and Free/Busy information from compatible applications on your desktop:
  • IceWarp Desktop Client
  • IceWarp Outlook Sync
  • IceWarp Notifier

delivery_status.deferred_info: delayed sending, the message will be sent at a later time
delivery_status.recalled_info: a scheduled future sending of the message has been withdrawn
delivery_status.queue_info: the message was temporarily deferred, server will try to send it later
delivery_status.error_info: check your inbox for detailed error message

error.invalid_login: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.
error.connection: Unable to reach server. Please check your internet connection or contact administrator.
error.servererror: Unable to access this service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.overloaded: The server is currently overloaded. Please try again later or contact administrator.

error.access_error: Unable to access mailbox folder, please contact administrator.
error.ip_mismatch: Your IP has changed, you will be logged out. To prevent this problem in the future, please access WebClient via HTTPS connection.

confirmation.clear_autosuggest: Do you wish to clear the auto-complete list?
confirmation.reset_password:
Hello %username%,
Did you request a password reset for your account (%email%) in WebClient?
Click the link below (or copy and paste it to your browser) to confirm that this email address belongs to you.
If you didn't make this request or have received this message in error, please ignore it.
%url%
confirmation.alias_confirmation:
Hello %username%,
Did you request to add (%email%) as a new From address in WebClient?
Click the link below (or copy and paste it to your browser) to confirm that this email address belongs to you.
If you didn't make this request or have received this message in error, please ignore it.
%url%
confirmation.unload: To prevent losing modified data, please check that all open items and message drafts have been saved.
confirmation.expired_msg: Unable to send or save unfinished messages. Your IP has been changed or the session expired.
confirmation.delete_account: Are you sure to remove account %s?
confirmation.recover_item: Are you sure to recover selected item(s)?
confirmation.delete_folder:
Are you sure to delete folder "%s"?
(All subfolders will be permanently deleted)
confirmation.delete_item: Are you sure to delete selected item(s)?
confirmation.delete_avatar: Current contact picture will be deleted
confirmation.blacklist_sender: Are you sure to blacklist sender of selected item(s)?
confirmation.blacklist_domain: Are you sure to blacklist all items from this domain?
confirmation.whitelist_sender: Are you sure to whitelist sender of selected item(s)?
confirmation.whitelist_domain: Are you sure to whitelist all items from this domain?
confirmation.empty_folder: Are you sure to delete all items in this folder?
confirmation.empty_to_trash: Are you sure to move all items from the folder to Trash?
confirmation.save_confirmation: Message not saved. Do you want to save the message in Drafts folder?
confirmation.save_file: File has been modified. Save the changes?
confirmation.create_reading_confirmation: The sender has requested a response to indicate that you have read this message. Would you like to send it?
confirmation.browser_warning_text_unsupported:
Your current browser is NOT OFFICIALLY SUPPORTED by IceWarp WebClient.
Please note that the performance of WebClient with your current browser could be extremely slow or inoperable.
WebClient has been optimized for use with Firefox 4.0 (or higher) and Internet Explorer 8.0 (or higher). We strongly recommend that you upgrade to the latest version of Internet Explorer or install Mozilla Firefox (both are free).
For the latest version of Firefox visit: http://www.firefox.com/ For the latest version of Internet Explorer visit: http://www.microsoft.com/ie/
Press OK to continue or press Cancel to switch to WebClient Tablet interface.
confirmation.expired_password: Your password has expired. Please change your password now.
confirmation.authenticate: For security reasons, you need to authenticate again.
confirmation.enterpass: Enter your password and sign in to continue your work, or log out to exit.

confirmation.expand: If you expand the list, it will be replaced with its members. You will not be able to collapse it again.
confirmation.send_event_update: Attendees will now be informed unless you suppress sending event updates for this change.
confirmation.notify_or_discard: Attendees will be informed of these changes.
confirmation.stopupload: Leaving this view will discontinue the current upload

devices.delete_confirmation:
Deleting the device from the list will cause data resynchronization upon the next connection (useful if the device stopped updating). If you instead want to erase all user/account data from the device, go to device Properties and click Remote Wipe.

Are you sure to delete the device(s) from the list?
devices.wipe_confirmation:
Remote Wipe will delete all user/account data from the device (and storage cards) and will reset the device to factory settings. The device must have a working internet connection.

Are you sure to continue?

sip.nowebrtc: Your browser doesn't support WebRTC for audio/video. Use another browser (we suggest Chrome) or install a WebRTC browser plugin.

autoresponder.subject: Subject
autoresponder.respond_only_if_to_me: Respond to messages sent to user's email address only

utilities.help_win_desktop2: Run the installer. In the Desktop Client main menu, select Tools - Accounts. The Accounts dialog appears. In this dialog, click New Account. The New Account wizard appears. Fill in the Email and Password fields and click Start Now.
utilities.help_win_desktop3: On the Account details page, you can modify your Account name. Click Next. On the next page, you can deactivate features that you do not want to use. Click Finish to complete the setup.
utilities.help_win_osync2: Run the installer. On the SmartDiscover page, enter your Email address and Password, do not tick the box Skip SmartDiscover and configure manually. Click Next.
utilities.help_win_osync3: In the next step, the License activation dialog is shown.
utilities.help_win_osync4: If you were granted a license for IceWarp Outlook Sync, click Yes. If you want to use IceWarp Outlook Sync within the scope of 30-day trial period first, click No.
utilities.help_win_osync5: Click Finish to complete the installation.
utilities.help_win_20131: In the File menu, on the Account Information page, click Add Account, the Add Account dialog opens. On the Auto Account Setup page, select the Manual setup or additional server types option and click Next. On the Choose Service page, select the Outlook.com or Exchange ActiveSync compatible service option and click Next.
utilities.help_win_20132: On the Server Settings page, fill in your user, server and logon information. Click Next.
utilities.help_win_20133: After the account settings test, click Finish.
utilities.help_osx_messages1: Open Messages and from the main menu select Messages - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Other messages account... and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_messages2: In the Add a Messages Account dialog, from the Account Type options, select Jabber. Enter your email address as Account Name and your Password. In the section Server Options, tick the box Use SSL. Leave other options on Auto. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_calendar1: Open Calendar and from the main menu select Calendar - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Add CalDAV Account and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_calendar2: In the Add a CalDAV Account dialog, from the Account Type options, select Manual. Enter your email address as User Name and your Password. Into the Server Address field, insert the server hostname. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_calendar3: To setup Reminders go to System Preferences - Internet Accounts and locate the calendar account you have just configured. Tick the checkbox by Use With: Reminders
utilities.help_osx_contacts1: Open Contacts and from the main menu select Contacts - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Other contacts account and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_contacts2: In the next dialog, select CardDAV option at the top. Enter your email address as User Name and your Password. Into the Server Address field, insert the server hostname. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_all2: Open the downloaded IceWarp Configurator image file. Run IceWarp Configurator. If prompted that the application was downloaded from the Internet, click Open. Fill in the Email Address and Password fields and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_all3: Each application that can be auto-configured will have a green Connect button next to it. Click one by one, or select Connect All to setup all available applications.
utilities.help_tablet_win1: On the right-hand side of the Start screen, select the Settings - Change PC Settings - Accounts. On the Accounts page, select the Other accounts option. On the Other accounts page, tap Add a user. On the next page, fill in the server hostname and tap Next.
utilities.help_tablet_win2: On the Create a Microsoft account page, fill in your account credentials and tap Next.
utilities.help_tablet_win3: On the Add security info page, set your security preferences and tap Next. On the Communication preferences page, tap Next. On the final page, tap Finish.
utilities.help_phone_and1: Go to System settings, in the Accounts section tap Add account and choose the Corporate option. On the Account setup screen, enter your email address and password. Type the server hostname received from administrator. Ticking Use secure connection (SSL) is highly recommended. Ticking Accept all SSL certificates can solve issues with unknown server certificates. Tap Next.
utilities.help_phone_and2: On the Remote security administration screen, press OK. This is essential to enforce your company's security policies on the device, or reset it remotely if lost.
utilities.help_phone_and3: On the Account settings screen, choose Inbox checking frequency and set how old emails to synchronize under Days to sync. Optionally tick Send email from this account by default, review other settings and tap Next.
utilities.help_phone_and4: Provide an account label to identify this account in applications and tap Next.
utilities.help_ios1: Go to Settings, select Mail, Contacts, Calendars - Add Account - Exchange options.
utilities.help_ios2: On the next page, fill in the Email, Password, Description fields. Tap Next.
utilities.help_ios3: On the next page, optionally deactivate features you do not want to use by sliding the controllers to off. Tap Save. Advanced settings can be found under the account's Description in the Mail, Contacts, Calendars - Accounts section.
utilities.help_phone_win1: Go to the application list by swiping to the left on the home screen. Scroll down and select Settings. Select the email+accounts option and continue with the add an account menu item. Select the Outlook account type. The OUTLOOK dialog is shown.
utilities.help_phone_win2: Fill in your Email address and Password. When done, tap sign in.
utilities.help_trademark: iPhone, iPad, Mac, OS X are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Microsoft, Windows, Outlook and Windows Phone are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. IceWarp is a registered trademark in the USA and other countries.
